summary: The concept of "management training" pertains to the systematic development of skills and competencies essential for effective leadership and organizational governance within the EU framework. This training is crucial for enhancing managerial capabilities, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards, and fostering a culture of accountability and transparency in public and private sectors. In the context of EU legal and regulatory documents, management training supports the implementation of policies aimed at improving administrative efficiency and promoting best practices. It is integral to various EU initiatives that seek to empower individuals and organizations to navigate complex regulatory environments effectively.
